sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Most common tech issues can be resolved remotely, without shipping your device or scheduling a home visit.
Our Remote support tools use encrypted connections and require your explicit permission before any work begins.
You can watch the entire session in real time, and disconnect at any moment with a single click.

sections.heading: What We Fix
items: Fix software issues, application crashes, and failed system updates
Diagnose slow performance caused by background tasks or bloatware
Resolve email sync, account login, and password reset issues
Install or troubleshoot device drivers, printers, and peripherals
Offer real-time training, walkthroughs, or app-specific support

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: Remote support is only available for local clients enrolled in a support plan. We visit your location to install and configure the secure remote access software. After setup, you can request help at any time. We are only able to connect with your permission. You stay in full control of every session.
